livegrep

Fast, regular expression code search service
git clone https://source.static.kevinlin.info/external/livegrep.git

query_test.go (4434B) (raw)

      1 package server
      2 
      3 import (
      4 	"encoding/json"
      5 	"reflect"
      6 	"testing"
      7 
      8 	pb "github.com/livegrep/livegrep/src/proto/go_proto"
      9 )
     10 
     11 func TestParseQuery(t *testing.T) {
     12 	cases := []struct {
     13 		in    string
     14 		out   pb.Query
     15 		regex bool
     16 	}{
     17 		// regex parse mode
     18 		{
     19 			"hello",
     20 			pb.Query{Line: "hello", FoldCase: true},
     21 			true,
     22 		},
     23 		{
     24 			"a b c",
     25 			pb.Query{Line: "a b c", FoldCase: true},
     26 			true,
     27 		},
     28 		{
     29 			"line file:.rb",
     30 			pb.Query{
     31 				Line:     "line",
     32 				File:     ".rb",
     33 				FoldCase: true,
     34 			},
     35 			true,
     36 		},
     37 		{
     38 			" a  ",
     39 			pb.Query{Line: "a", FoldCase: true},
     40 			true,
     41 		},
     42 		{
     43 			"( a  )",
     44 			pb.Query{Line: "( a  )", FoldCase: true},
     45 			true,
     46 		},
     47 		{
     48 			"Aa",
     49 			pb.Query{Line: "Aa", FoldCase: false},
     50 			true,
     51 		},
     52 		{
     53 			"case:abc",
     54 			pb.Query{Line: "abc", FoldCase: false},
     55 			true,
     56 		},
     57 		{
     58 			"case:abc file:^kernel/",
     59 			pb.Query{Line: "abc", FoldCase: false, File: "^kernel/"},
     60 			true,
     61 		},
     62 		{
     63 			"case:abc file:( )",
     64 			pb.Query{Line: "abc", FoldCase: false, File: "( )"},
     65 			true,
     66 		},
     67 		{
     68 			"(  () (   ",
     69 			pb.Query{Line: "(  () (", FoldCase: true},
     70 			true,
     71 		},
     72 		{
     73 			`a file:\(`,
     74 			pb.Query{Line: "a", File: `\(`, FoldCase: true},
     75 			true,
     76 		},
     77 		{
     78 			`a file:(\()`,
     79 			pb.Query{Line: "a", File: `(\()`, FoldCase: true},
     80 			true,
     81 		},
     82 		{
     83 			`(`,
     84 			pb.Query{Line: "(", FoldCase: true},
     85 			true,
     86 		},
     87 		{
     88 			`(file:)`,
     89 			pb.Query{Line: "(file:)", FoldCase: true},
     90 			true,
     91 		},
     92 		{
     93 			`re tags:kind:function`,
     94 			pb.Query{Line: "re", FoldCase: true, Tags: "kind:function"},
     95 			true,
     96 		},
     97 		{
     98 			`-file:Godep re`,
     99 			pb.Query{Line: "re", NotFile: "Godep", FoldCase: true},
    100 			true,
    101 		},
    102 		{
    103 			`-file:. -repo:Godep re`,
    104 			pb.Query{Line: "re", NotFile: ".", NotRepo: "Godep", FoldCase: true},
    105 			true,
    106 		},
    107 		{
    108 			`-tags:kind:class re`,
    109 			pb.Query{Line: "re", NotTags: "kind:class", FoldCase: true},
    110 			true,
    111 		},
    112 		{
    113 			`case:foo:`,
    114 			pb.Query{Line: "foo:", FoldCase: false},
    115 			true,
    116 		},
    117 		{
    118 			`lit:.`,
    119 			pb.Query{Line: `\.`, FoldCase: false},
    120 			true,
    121 		},
    122 		{
    123 			`std::string`,
    124 			pb.Query{Line: `std::string`, FoldCase: true},
    125 			true,
    126 		},
    127 		{
    128 			`a max_matches:100`,
    129 			pb.Query{Line: "a", FoldCase: true, MaxMatches: 100},
    130 			true,
    131 		},
    132 		{
    133 			`a max_matches:`,
    134 			pb.Query{Line: "a", FoldCase: true},
    135 			true,
    136 		},
    137 		{
    138 			`file:hello`,
    139 			pb.Query{Line: "hello", FoldCase: true, FilenameOnly: true},
    140 			true,
    141 		},
    142 		{
    143 			`file:HELLO`,
    144 			pb.Query{Line: "HELLO", FoldCase: false, FilenameOnly: true},
    145 			true,
    146 		},
    147 		{
    148 			`lit:a( file:b`,
    149 			pb.Query{Line: `a\(`, File: "b", FoldCase: false},
    150 			true,
    151 		},
    152 		{
    153 			`lit:a(b file:c`,
    154 			pb.Query{Line: `a\(b`, File: "c", FoldCase: false},
    155 			true,
    156 		},
    157 		{
    158 			`[(] file:\.c`,
    159 			pb.Query{Line: `[(]`, File: "\\.c", FoldCase: true},
    160 			true,
    161 		},
    162 		{
    163 			`[ ] file:\.c`,
    164 			pb.Query{Line: `[ ]`, File: "\\.c", FoldCase: true},
    165 			true,
    166 		},
    167 		{
    168 			`[ \]] file:\.c`,
    169 			pb.Query{Line: `[ \]]`, File: "\\.c", FoldCase: true},
    170 			true,
    171 		},
    172 
    173 		// literal parse mode
    174 		{
    175 			"a( file:b",
    176 			pb.Query{Line: `a\(`, File: "b", FoldCase: true},
    177 			false,
    178 		},
    179 		{
    180 			"a (file:b",
    181 			pb.Query{Line: `a \(file:b`, FoldCase: true},
    182 			false,
    183 		},
    184 		{
    185 			"(file:a b",
    186 			pb.Query{Line: `\(file:a b`, FoldCase: true},
    187 			false,
    188 		},
    189 		{
    190 			"(file:a) b",
    191 			pb.Query{Line: `\(file:a\) b`, FoldCase: true},
    192 			false,
    193 		},
    194 		{
    195 			"(file:a repo:b",
    196 			pb.Query{Line: `\(file:a repo:b`, FoldCase: true},
    197 			false,
    198 		},
    199 		{
    200 			"(file:a) repo:b",
    201 			pb.Query{Line: `\(file:a\)`, Repo: "b", FoldCase: true},
    202 			false,
    203 		},
    204 		{
    205 			"(file:a) (repo:b)",
    206 			pb.Query{Line: `\(file:a\) \(repo:b\)`, FoldCase: true},
    207 			false,
    208 		},
    209 		{
    210 			"file:a( b",
    211 			pb.Query{Line: `b`, File: `a\(`, FoldCase: true},
    212 			false,
    213 		},
    214 	}
    215 
    216 	for _, tc := range cases {
    217 		parsed, err := ParseQuery(tc.in, tc.regex)
    218 		if !reflect.DeepEqual(tc.out, parsed) {
    219 			got, _ := json.MarshalIndent(parsed, "", "  ")
    220 			want, _ := json.MarshalIndent(tc.out, "", "  ")
    221 			t.Errorf("error parsing %q: expected:\n%s\ngot:\n%s",
    222 				tc.in, want, got)
    223 		}
    224 		if err != nil {
    225 			t.Errorf("parse(%v) error=%v", tc.in, err)
    226 		}
    227 	}
    228 }
    229 
    230 func TestParseQueryError(t *testing.T) {
    231 	cases := []struct {
    232 		in string
    233 	}{
    234 		{"case:a b"},
    235 		{"lit:a b"},
    236 		{"case:a lit:b"},
    237 		{"a max_matches:a"},
    238 		{"a file:b c"},
    239 		{"a file:((abc()())()) c"},
    240 	}
    241 
    242 	for _, tc := range cases {
    243 		parsed, err := ParseQuery(tc.in, true)
    244 		if err == nil {
    245 			t.Errorf("expected an error parsing (%v), got %#v", tc.in, parsed)
    246 		}
    247 	}
    248 }
